name: INUpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemUnsupportedReason
desc: Reasons the app can’t update the user’s affinity for the media item.

items.name: case loginRequired
items.desc: The user must log in to the app.

items.name: case subscriptionRequired
items.desc: The user must have a subscription to the app's service.

items.name: case explicitContentSettings
items.desc: The explicit content settings don’t allow the user to update the media item's affinity.

items.name: case cellularDataSettings
items.desc: The cellular data settings don’t allow the user to update the media item's affinity.

items.name: case restrictedContent
items.desc: The media item is restricted content.

items.name: case regionRestriction
items.desc: The app can’t update the user’s affinity for the media because the media isn’t available in the user’s geographic location.

items.name: case serviceUnavailable
items.desc: The app can’t update the user’s affinity because the media service is unavailable.
